MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the SY17 and SY21 postcode areas of Caersws, affecting a large number of properties in the local area. Our emergency response team has managed to restore power to a number of properties, and we are working to restore power for those customers still off supply. Repairs are taking longer than expected because of further network investigations required and our team are now working to get the power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 1:00AM. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 10:26PM on 2nd March 2021.
